definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: I will have a gold card.
sentences.chinese: 我想辦一張貴行的牡丹信用卡。

sentences.english: Please show us your card so we can identify whether it is one of them.
sentences.chinese: 請出示您的信用卡，我們來識別是否屬於白金卡系列。

sentences.english: Credit cards are an example of open-end credit.
sentences.chinese: 信用卡即爲開放型貸款的一種形式。

sentences.english: Pay off all high interest debt, such as credit cards.
sentences.chinese: 還清所有高利息的債務，例如信用卡。

sentences.english: This article shows an example that collects credit card information.
sentences.chinese: 本文給出了一個收集信用卡信息的例子。

sentences.english: Your credit cards are maxed out because of it.
sentences.chinese: 因爲你的信用卡共混出井口。

sentences.english: We'll need you to sign a credit card voucher in advance.
sentences.chinese: 你們需要提前籤一下信用卡的單據。

sentences.english: A decade ago, my credit cards were my emergency fund.
We cannot accept copies of online credit card statements.
sentences.chinese: 我們不接受在線信用卡賬戶電子結單的複印件。

sentences.english: After all, you don't need to input a PIN every time you use your credit card.
sentences.chinese: 總之，在使用信用卡時，你不必每次輸入個人識別碼。

sentences.english: But nowadays people use credit cards.
sentences.chinese: 但現在人們使用信用卡。

sentences.english: Sunrider uses this credit card information solely to process your order.
sentences.chinese: 仙妮蕾德只限使用有關信用卡資料處理您的訂單。

sentences.english: I ended up putting $50, 000 on my personal credit cards.
sentences.chinese: 以五萬美元存到我個人的信用卡作爲結束。

sentences.english: If so, this shows that you or your partner has control over spending and credit-card use.
sentences.chinese: 如果是的話，說明你或你的對象能很好的使用信用卡。

sentences.english: Your account was initially thought to be involved in carder activity .
sentences.chinese: 最初我們認爲你的賬戶涉嫌信用卡欺詐。

definition: Ant Check Later, consumer credit service offered by Ant Financial Services 螞蟻金服|蚂蚁金服[Ma3 yi3 Jin1 fu2]
a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
online banking/abbr. for 網上銀行|网上银行[wang3 shang4 yin2 hang2]
ICBC (Industrial and Commercial Bank of China)/abbr. for 工商銀行|工商银行[Gong1 Shang1 Yin2 hang2]
